tool_description: Analyzes contract terms and clauses to identify potential legal, financial, and operational risks with severity assessments.

contract_terms.description: Contract terms and clauses to analyze for risks

party_perspective.description: Perspective for risk analysis: buyer, seller, vendor, client, neutral

error_messages: No terms provided: Contract terms array cannot be empty
Invalid risk categories: Use recognized risk category names
Invalid party perspective: Use one of [buyer, seller, vendor, client, neutral]
Terms too complex: Individual terms exceed analysis complexity limit
usage: Provide contract terms to analyze, specify risk categories of interest, and set the perspective. The tool will identify and assess various risks.

identified_risks.description: List of specific risks identified in the contract

risk_severity.description: Severity level for each identified risk

risk_categories_found.description: Categories of risks present in the contract

mitigation_suggestions.description: Suggested approaches to mitigate identified risks
